statements: SELECT candidate_name, screening_result FROM candidate_screening;
SELECT * FROM candidate_screening WHERE screening_result = TRUE;
SELECT candidate_name, screening_criteria FROM candidate_screening WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidate_screening WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM candidate_screening ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_screening WHERE screening_result = TRUE;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name FROM candidate_screening WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM candidate_screening ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, COUNT(*) FROM candidate_screening GROUP BY candidate_id;
SELECT * FROM candidate_screening WHERE screening_criteria->>'experience' >= '3 years';
SELECT * FROM candidate_criteria;
SELECT criteria_id, criteria_name FROM candidate_criteria ORDER BY criteria_id DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_application WHERE criteria_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM candidate_criteria WHERE criteria_id = 2;
SELECT candidate_name, criteria_id FROM candidate_application WHERE candidate_id = 5;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_application ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_criteria WHERE criteria_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, criteria_name FROM candidate_application JOIN candidate_criteria ON candidate_application.criteria_id = candidate_criteria.criteria_id;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_application WHERE candidate_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT criteria_name, criteria_description FROM candidate_criteria WHERE criteria_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_criteria ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, skills FROM candidate_criteria WHERE education_level = 'Master';
SELECT candidate_id, criteria_id, passed FROM candidate_screening_results WHERE score > 80;
SELECT criteria_name, weight FROM screening_criteria ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_criteria WHERE experience_years >= 5 AND skills LIKE '%Python%';
SELECT candidate_name, experience_years, skills, education_level FROM candidate_criteria;
SELECT candidate_name, experience_years, education_level FROM candidate_criteria WHERE experience_years >= 3;
SELECT * FROM screening_criteria ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_criteria WHERE skills LIKE '%Java%' AND education_level = 'Master';
SELECT candidate_name, criteria_name, passed FROM candidate_criteria JOIN candidate_screening_results ON candidate_criteria.id = candidate_screening_results.candidate_id;
SELECT * FROM Candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_experience FROM Candidates ORDER BY candidate_experience DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_email FROM Candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_phone FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_experience > 5;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_experience, candidate_email FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_experience > 3 ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CandidateFeedback WHERE feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, candidate_phone FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_experience < 2;
SELECT result_id, result_value FROM ScreeningResults WHERE criteria_id = 1 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Candidates;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Candidates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT experience_years, current_job_title FROM Candidates WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM CandidateAssessments WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT candidate_id, overall_rating FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE overall_rating IS NOT NULL ORDER BY overall_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Candidates ORDER BY email DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT candidate_id, name, experience_years FROM Candidates WHERE experience_years > 5 AND current_job_title = 'Senior Developer';

SELECT c.name, s.criteria_description, ca.score FROM Candidates c JOIN CandidateAssessments ca ON c.candidate_id = ca.candidate_id JOIN ScreeningCriteria s ON ca.criteria_id = s.criteria_id WHERE ca.score >= s.minimum_score;
SELECT cr.report_id, c.name AS candidate_name, cr.pass_status FROM Candidates c INNER JOIN ScreeningReports cr ON c.candidate_id = cr.candidate_id WHERE cr.pass_status IS TRUE;

SELECT i.feedback_id, c.name AS candidate_name, i.interviewer_name, i.overall_rating FROM Candidates c JOIN InterviewFeedback i ON c.candidate_id = i.candidate_id WHERE i.overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY i.overall_rating DESC;
